head.title: SE Group 2 - 2009-2010
head.summary: Homepage of the Software Engineering Group 2 in 2009-2010
head.keywords: Free Software, Open Source, Auction, Webapp, Java, Jave EE, VUB, Vrije Universiteit Brussel, Computer Science, Belgium

webpage.para: We're a group of seven students who are assigned to design and implement the software behind an online auction website such as eBay. We codenamed our project Salesmen, which will be distributed under an Open Source license. Learn more
